name: Pregabalin prescribed as Lyrica
title: Prescribing of branded Lyrica
compared with prescribing of all pregabalin
description: as a proportion of total items for pregabalin.
why_it_matters: required to recommend to GPs that when used for pain pregabalin should be prescribed as the branded product Lyrica,
in order to be in line with the patent. <a href='https://psnc.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/Pregabalin-guidance-2017.pdf'>
In July 2017 this guidance was rescinded as the patent for pain had expired. Costs of the generic
product fell sharply in August 2017, and practices should now follow normal practice for prescribing, i.e.
usually prescribe by the generic name.
